title: Premiere: BASECAMP – Shudder (GXNXVS Remix)
body:
Over the course of the past year, Nashville trio BASECAMP have become one of the most talked about emerging artists.

Having packed out venues at SXSW earlier in the year, their unique brand of sleek, emotive R&B has made them a real contender for serious success in 2015. This new remix comes courtesy of GXNXVS, moulding recent online hit Shudder into a slow-burning, dance floor ready jam. Check it out below, alongside the original.
